executive_summary: The Medical Marijuana Dispensaries industry, which includes stores that retail medical marijuana by prescription only, has expanded dramatically. Medical marijuana is most used for pain control, typically to ease chronic pain. Marijuana can additionally be used to manage nausea, anxiety, and weight loss. The legalization of marijuana for medical purposes and the growing acceptance of marijuana use for medical purposes has provided enterprises and investors with unprecedented opportunities. As states increasingly pass legislation permitting the sale and use of medical marijuana, there has been no lack of demand. As a result, medical marijuana has become one of the fastest-growing industries in the US.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: The industry has been experiencing rapid growth
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Consumers have continually become more accepting of alternative treatments via marijuana products.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Industry growth was durable through the COVID-19 pandemic
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Despite poor economic conditions, the industry underwent significant growth during the pandemic.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: New product development is spurring demand
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The development of alternative ways to consume marijuana has supported the industry in attracting more consumers.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Regulation continues to constrict the industry
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Regulation from all levels of government presents the greatest challenge to medical marijuana dispensaries.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: The industry continues to benefit from research into potential uses and favorable attitudes toward medical marijuana
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The industry will be supported by having more credibility with consumers.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Growth will be stunted by competition from the recreational market
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The increasing legalization of recreational marijuana places pressure on the industry.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Events as states ease restrictions on marijuana use, regulation still remains an obstacle to industry growth
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The industry is subject to heavy regulation from all levels of government.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Medical marijuana demand grows in parallel to an aging population
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: An aging population will benefit the industry as more people can be treated with marijuana.

industry_definition: Companies in this industry distribute marijuana to individuals with a prescription.
key_trends: The Medical Marijuana Dispensaries industry experiences a substantial amount of competition, most notably from recreational dispensaries.
Despite poor economic conditions, the industry experienced significant growth during the COVID-19 pandemic.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Intractable muscular spasticity is a condition in which the body's muscles seize or tighten.
Medical marijuana has been used to treat individuals suffering from severe or chronic pain.

products_and_services.product_description: Marijuana-infused products that can be consumed orally.

tier_1_suppliers: Medical & Recreational Marijuana Growing in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_description: Household income levels determine consumers' ability to purchase marijuana.
